data.title: C&S Wholesale Grocers
data.meta_description: C&S Wholesale Grocers is the largest wholesale grocery supply company in the U.S. and an industry leader in supply chain. Founded in 1918, we have a strong
data.text:
Who We Are...

C&S Wholesale Grocers, LLC is an industry leader in supply chain solutions and wholesale grocery supply in the United States. Founded in 1918 as a supplier to independent grocery stores, C&S now services customers of all sizes, supplying more than 7,500 independent supermarkets, chain stores, military bases and institutions with over 100,000 different products. C&S also proudly operates and supports corporate grocery stores and services independent franchisees under a chain-style model throughout the Midwest, South and Northeast. We are an engaged corporate citizen, supporting causes that positively impact our communities.

Read More

Braggingly Happy Customers

Why choose C&S? With more than 104 years of challenging the status quo, C&S is an industry leader known for being a driving force behind our customers' success. Our supply chain capabilities and innovative insights make us your competitive advantage!

Read More

Join a Winning Team

At C&S, you will be recognized and rewarded in a culture that fosters belonging, recognizes uniqueness, empowers all to share their experiences and ideas and allows each employee to maximize their potential. Our legacy of giving back drives our daily work to feed our communities.

Join Us
